nodes.text: The Varonchagger was a starship used by Jedi Knight Vernestra Rwoh and Padawan Lula Talisola to travel to the planet Valo to respond to a Nihil attack there. Upon arriving at Valo, Rwoh and Talisola participated in a fight against Nihil starfighters in the craft, before Rwoh eventually crash-landed the Varonchagger on a beach near Lonisa City. Rwoh felt that Shipmaster Nubarron would not forgive her for crashing the ship.
